text: David M. Lewis is an American politician and a Republican member of the Montana Legislature. He was elected to Senate District 42, representing the Helena, Montana area, in 2004. Previously he served two sessions in the Montana House of Representatives. Lewis held several positions for the State of Montana prior to being elected to the Montana House of Representatives, most recently including State Budget Director. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1942 births Category:Montana Republicans Category:Montana state senators Category:Politicians from Helena, Montana Category:Politicians from Rapid City, South Dakota Category:Members of the Montana House of Representatives
title: Dave Lewis (politician)
